text: Metis (born March 28, 1984) is a Japanese reggae singer. She is from Hiroshima. She has released one album, ONE LOVE. Her most famous song is "Umehasaitaka Sakurahamadakaina". ==Albums== *Answer (2005) *Music (2006) *WOMAN (2006) *ONE LOVE (2007) ==Singles== *Umehasaitaka Sakurahamadakaina (2007) *Respect! (2007) *Katyouhuugetu (2007) Category:Japanese singers Category:People from Hiroshima Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Hiroshima Prefecture
title: Metis (reggae artist)
